content: "{\"object\":\"value\",\"document\":{\"object\":\"document\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":125846,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d2c7b608-a2e3-4ade-bafc-b06840e91c95/10.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/d2c7b608-a2e3-4ade-bafc-b06840e91c95/10.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10.PNG\",\"name\":\"10.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"d2c7b608-a2e3-4ade-bafc-b06840e91c95\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":937,\"height\":151},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Bose needed a strong digital partner and was considering EPAM along with other vendors. The client came with needs and \\\"pain points\\\" that are typical for large corporations with their own e-commerce platforms: \\\"We feel that there are quality issues\\\" and \\\"time to market is too long.”\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The cooperation started with a five-week AEM assessment, with DevOps engineers taking an active part. Our colleagues were ready to kick off the on-site assessment at the Bose office in the Belgian city of Tongeren. The EPAM team made presentations, demonstrating what and how they would assess in regression testing, CI/CD DevOps pipeline, AEM development, did the business trip preparations ... But then the pandemic hit, and plans changed.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"The EPAMers recalibrated the assessment on the fly to suit the remote format and went ahead. It began according to the timeline, on March 16 – online. EPAMers conducted interviews with Bose stakeholders to outline the current state, reviewed artifacts and performed root cause analysis. On April 17th, the EPAMers gave a final presentation with the formalized recommendations for improving processes. \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"“This remote-format assessment was a unique experience, for us at EPAM and for Bose,” admits \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://telescope.epam.com/who/key/upsaId/4000600100000178107\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Roman Makarevich\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\", offshore Delivery Manager. “Neither COVID-19 nor the virtual nature of assessment impacted its quality, depth of analysis, and outcomes.”\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Here’s what Keith Davis, our primary stakeholder in Bose Digital Office, later said at the first Bose/EPAM QBR.\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\\"You did an excellent job working with this. People were literally booked on flights, ready to go. We had a very tight timeframe to make this happen, and you guys showed a lot of flexibility and worked through that, without any impact on our plans\\\".\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"note-link\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"There’s an article about Bose on the EPAM Infoportal. Read here: \",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://info.epam.com/topics/global/competencies-technologies/articles/2020/aug/bose-project-story_en.html\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"EPAM and Bose team up to create a better digital experience for sound-lovers\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[{\"object\":\"mark\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-bold\",\"data\":{}}]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":9794,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9a3094ef-5aaf-4b8e-a483-b984af6805e1/10-5.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/9a3094ef-5aaf-4b8e-a483-b984af6805e1/10-5.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10-5.PNG\",\"name\":\"10-5.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"9a3094ef-5aaf-4b8e-a483-b984af6805e1\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":832,\"height\":182},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":87107,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/02cbc505-1424-4ac5-b0ad-4ad97c8fc432/10-1.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/02cbc505-1424-4ac5-b0ad-4ad97c8fc432/10-1.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10-1.PNG\",\"name\":\"10-1.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"02cbc505-1424-4ac5-b0ad-4ad97c8fc432\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":560.261688764829},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":67657,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b0c2aadf-753e-4334-a381-298547d6a2ae/10-2.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/b0c2aadf-753e-4334-a381-298547d6a2ae/10-2.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10-2.PNG\",\"name\":\"10-2.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"b0c2aadf-753e-4334-a381-298547d6a2ae\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":552},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":68507,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e0cf0b01-d537-40f8-9df0-4f3b7de6a073/10-3.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/e0cf0b01-d537-40f8-9df0-4f3b7de6a073/10-3.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10-3.PNG\",\"name\":\"10-3.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"e0cf0b01-d537-40f8-9df0-4f3b7de6a073\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":557.7060055865921},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":78124,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a6e8fe30-b599-4693-8a34-f52d09380723/10-4.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/a6e8fe30-b599-4693-8a34-f52d09380723/10-4.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10-4.PNG\",\"name\":\"10-4.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"a6e8fe30-b599-4693-8a34-f52d09380723\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":1055,\"height\":558.3995815899582},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"separatorBLock\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":22440,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1fec5854-5bed-4075-bc6d-0b04a5279aa0/10-6.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/1fec5854-5bed-4075-bc6d-0b04a5279aa0/10-6.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"10-6.PNG\",\"name\":\"10-6.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"1fec5854-5bed-4075-bc6d-0b04a5279aa0\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":833,\"height\":284},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
